description: Manage IoT device module twin configuration.

commands.name: az iot hub module-twin replace
commands.summary: Replace a module twin definition with target json.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub module-twin replace --device-id
                               --json
                               --module-id
                               [--auth-type {key, login}]
                               [--etag]
                               [--hub-name]
                               [--login]
                               [--resource-group]

commands.name: az iot hub module-twin show
commands.syntax:
az iot hub module-twin show --device-id
                            --module-id
                            [--auth-type {key, login}]
                            [--hub-name]
                            [--login]
                            [--resource-group]

commands.name: az iot hub module-twin update
commands.summary: Update module twin desired properties and tags.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub module-twin update --device-id
                              --module-id
                              [--add]
                              [--auth-type {key, login}]
                              [--desired]
                              [--etag]
                              [--force-string]
                              [--hub-name]
                              [--login]
                              [--remove]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--set]
                              [--tags]
examples: az iot hub module-twin update -n {iothub_name} -d {device_id} -m {module_id} --desired '{"condition":{"temperature":{"critical": null}}}'
